Item3.Text: 2015年1月末 担保集团委贷余额

Reader.Name: tab_detail
Reader.Sql:
SELECT cc.fullAreaName, cc.`relationMainName`, cc.`clientName`, IFNULL(capitalSum,0) capitalSum, IFNULL(cc.liabilitySum,0) liabilitySum, IFNULL(db15.guarantySum, 0) timePointSum, IFNULL(wd15.`guarantySum`,0) timePointEntrustSum, IFNULL(wdAll15.`guarantySum`,0) wdAllGuarantySum, IFNULL(tt1.guarantySum,0) guarantySum, IFNULL(cc.creditorSum,0) creditorSum, IFNULL(tt2.entrustSum,0) entrustSum, IFNULL(pay.payCapitalSum,0) payCapitalSum, IFNULL(pay.payInterestSum,0) payInterestSum, IFNULL(tt3.replaceSum,0) replaceSum FROM crm_client cc LEFT JOIN crm_client_relationmain ccr ON ccr.`client_ID` = cc.client_ID LEFT JOIN crm_relationmain cr ON cr.`relationMain_ID` = ccr.`relationMain_ID` LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pa.`clientGUID`, SUM((IFNULL(pp.loadSum, 0) - IFNULL(tab1.payCapitalSum, 0) - IFNULL(tab2.replaceCapitalSum, 0))) AS guarantySum FROM pro_project pp LEFT JOIN pro_apply pa ON pp.`apply_ID` = pa.`apply_ID` LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pfp.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pfp.payCapitalSum, 0)) AS payCapitalSum FROM pro_factpay pfp WHERE 1 = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT(pfp.payDate,'%Y-%m')<='2015-01' GROUP BY pfp.project_ID ) tab1 ON tab1.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pre.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pre.replaceCapitalSum, 0)) AS replaceCapitalSum FROM pro_replace pre WHERE 1 = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT(pre.replaceDate,'%Y-%m')<='2015-01' GROUP BY pre.project_ID ) tab2 ON tab2.project_ID = pp.project_ID WHERE pp.`busiClass` = '01' AND DATE_FORMAT(pp.reportDate,'%Y-%m')<= '2015-01' GROUP BY pa.`clientGUID` ) db15 ON db15.clientGUID = cc.`clientGUID`
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pa.`clientGUID`, SUM((IFNULL(pp.loadSum, 0) - IFNULL(tab1.payCapitalSum, 0) - IFNULL(tab2.replaceCapitalSum, 0))) AS guarantySum FROM pro_project pp LEFT JOIN pro_apply pa ON pp.`apply_ID` = pa.`apply_ID` LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pfp.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pfp.payCapitalSum, 0)) AS payCapitalSum FROM pro_factpay pfp WHERE 1 = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT(pfp.payDate,'%Y-%m')<='2015-01' GROUP BY pfp.project_ID ) tab1 ON tab1.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pre.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pre.replaceCapitalSum, 0)) AS replaceCapitalSum FROM pro_replace pre WHERE 1 = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT(pre.replaceDate,'%Y-%m')<='2015-01' GROUP BY pre.project_ID ) tab2 ON tab2.project_ID = pp.project_ID WHERE pp.`busiClass` = '02' AND DATE_FORMAT(pp.reportDate,'%Y-%m') <= '2015-01' AND pa.guarantyOrgID in ('1b6f710ce5054d1d8f9d495f7bc1e142','fbe555a29dd94ed08dacf374dcd85ead','d6f953c683ea41abb946a42fc1004642','73c1bb3d20614bdfa91281622c5b9334') GROUP BY pa.`clientGUID` ) wd15 ON wd15.clientGUID = cc.`clientGUID`
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pa.`clientGUID`, SUM((IFNULL(pp.loadSum, 0) - IFNULL(tab1.payCapitalSum, 0) - IFNULL(tab2.replaceCapitalSum, 0))) AS guarantySum FROM pro_project pp LEFT JOIN pro_apply pa ON pp.`apply_ID` = pa.`apply_ID` LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pfp.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pfp.payCapitalSum, 0)) AS payCapitalSum FROM pro_factpay pfp WHERE 1 = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT(pfp.payDate,'%Y-%m')<='2015-01' GROUP BY pfp.project_ID ) tab1 ON tab1.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pre.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pre.replaceCapitalSum, 0)) AS replaceCapitalSum FROM pro_replace pre WHERE 1 = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT(pre.replaceDate,'%Y-%m')<='2015-01' GROUP BY pre.project_ID ) tab2 ON tab2.project_ID = pp.project_ID WHERE pp.`busiClass` = '02' AND DATE_FORMAT(pp.reportDate,'%Y-%m') <= '2015-01' GROUP BY pa.`clientGUID` ) wdAll15 ON wdAll15.clientGUID = cc.`clientGUID`
LEFT JOIN (SELECT pa.`clientGUID`,SUM((IFNULL(pp.loadSum,0)-IFNULL(tab1.payCapitalSum,0)-IFNULL(tab2.replaceCapitalSum,0))) AS guarantySum FROM pro_project pp LEFT JOIN pro_apply pa ON pp.`apply_ID` = pa.`apply_ID` LEFT JOIN (SELECT pfp.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pfp.payCapitalSum,0)) AS payCapitalSum FROM pro_factpay pfp WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pfp.payDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} GROUP BY pfp.project_ID )tab1 ON tab1.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pre.project_ID,SUM(IFNULL(pre.replaceCapitalSum,0)) AS replaceCapitalSum FROM pro_replace pre WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pre.replaceDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} GROUP BY pre.project_ID )tab2 ON tab2.project_ID = pp.project_ID WHERE pp.`busiClass` = '01' ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pp.`delayBeginDate`,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} ${has(wheresql)?(" and wheresql='"+wheresql+"'"):""} GROUP BY pa.`clientGUID` ) tt1 ON tt1.clientGUID = cc.`clientGUID` LEFT JOIN (SELECT pa.`clientGUID`,SUM((IFNULL(pp.loadSum,0)-IFNULL(tab1.payCapitalSum,0))) AS entrustSum FROM pro_project pp LEFT JOIN pro_apply pa ON pp.`apply_ID` = pa.`apply_ID` LEFT JOIN (SELECT pfp.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pfp.payCapitalSum,0)) AS payCapitalSum FROM pro_factpay pfp WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY pfp.project_ID )tab1 ON tab1.project_ID = pp.project_ID WHERE pp.`busiClass` = '02' ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pp.`delayBeginDate`,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} ${has(wheresql)?(" and wheresql='"+wheresql+"'"):""} GROUP BY pa.`clientGUID` ) tt2 ON tt2.clientGUID = cc.`clientGUID` LEFT JOIN (SELECT pa.`clientGUID`,SUM(pfp.`payCapitalSum`) payCapitalSum,SUM(pfp.`payInterestSum`) payInterestSum FROM pro_factpay pfp LEFT JOIN pro_project pp ON pp.`project_ID` = pfp.`project_ID` LEFT JOIN pro_apply pa ON pfp.`applyID` = pa.`apply_ID` WHERE pp.`busiClass` = '02' ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pfp.payDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pp.`delayBeginDate`,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} ${has(wheresql)?(" and wheresql='"+wheresql+"'"):""} GROUP BY pa.`clientGUID` ) pay ON pay.clientGUID = cc.`clientGUID`
LEFT JOIN (SELECT pa.`clientGUID`,SUM(IFNULL(tab1.replaceSum,0)-IFNULL(tab2.returnSum,0)) AS replaceSum FROM pro_project pp LEFT JOIN pro_apply pa ON pp.`apply_ID` = pa.`apply_ID` LEFT JOIN (SELECT pre.project_ID,SUM(IFNULL(pre.replaceSum,0)) AS replaceSum FROM pro_replace pre WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pre.replaceDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} GROUP BY pre.project_ID)tab1 ON tab1.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT prd.projectID,SUM(IFNULL(prd.returnSum,0)) AS returnSum FROM pro_returnDetail prd WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(prd.returnDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} GROUP BY prd.projectID) tab2 ON tab2.projectID = pp.project_ID WHERE pp.`busiClass` = '01' GROUP BY pa.`clientGUID` )tt3 ON tt3.clientGUID = cc.`clientGUID` WHERE cr.projectTypeID = '44950f5de8614f1588841a9556ba52a2'
Reader.Description:
SELECT cc.fullAreaName, cc.`relationMainName`, cc.`clientName`, IFNULL(capitalSum,0) capitalSum, IFNULL(cc.liabilitySum,0) liabilitySum, IFNULL(db15.guarantySum, 0) timePointSum, IFNULL(wd15.`guarantySum`,0) timePointEntrustSum, IFNULL(wdAll15.`guarantySum`,0) wdAllGuarantySum, IFNULL(tt1.guarantySum,0) guarantySum, IFNULL(cc.creditorSum,0) creditorSum, IFNULL(tt2.entrustSum,0) entrustSum, IFNULL(pay.payCapitalSum,0) payCapitalSum, IFNULL(pay.payInterestSum,0) payInterestSum, IFNULL(tt3.replaceSum,0) replaceSum FROM crm_client cc LEFT JOIN crm_client_relationmain ccr ON ccr.`client_ID` = cc.client_ID LEFT JOIN crm_relationmain cr ON cr.`relationMain_ID` = ccr.`relationMain_ID` LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pa.`clientGUID`, SUM((IFNULL(pp.loadSum, 0) - IFNULL(tab1.payCapitalSum, 0) - IFNULL(tab2.replaceCapitalSum, 0))) AS guarantySum FROM pro_project pp LEFT JOIN pro_apply pa ON pp.`apply_ID` = pa.`apply_ID` LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pfp.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pfp.payCapitalSum, 0)) AS payCapitalSum FROM pro_factpay pfp WHERE 1 = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT(pfp.payDate,'%Y-%m')<='2015-01' GROUP BY pfp.project_ID ) tab1 ON tab1.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pre.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pre.replaceCapitalSum, 0)) AS replaceCapitalSum FROM pro_replace pre WHERE 1 = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT(pre.replaceDate,'%Y-%m')<='2015-01' GROUP BY pre.project_ID ) tab2 ON tab2.project_ID = pp.project_ID WHERE pp.`busiClass` = '01' AND DATE_FORMAT(pp.reportDate,'%Y-%m')<= '2015-01' GROUP BY pa.`clientGUID` ) db15 ON db15.clientGUID = cc.`clientGUID`
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pa.`clientGUID`, SUM((IFNULL(pp.loadSum, 0) - IFNULL(tab1.payCapitalSum, 0) - IFNULL(tab2.replaceCapitalSum, 0))) AS guarantySum FROM pro_project pp LEFT JOIN pro_apply pa ON pp.`apply_ID` = pa.`apply_ID` LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pfp.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pfp.payCapitalSum, 0)) AS payCapitalSum FROM pro_factpay pfp WHERE 1 = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT(pfp.payDate,'%Y-%m')<='2015-01' GROUP BY pfp.project_ID ) tab1 ON tab1.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pre.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pre.replaceCapitalSum, 0)) AS replaceCapitalSum FROM pro_replace pre WHERE 1 = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT(pre.replaceDate,'%Y-%m')<='2015-01' GROUP BY pre.project_ID ) tab2 ON tab2.project_ID = pp.project_ID WHERE pp.`busiClass` = '02' AND DATE_FORMAT(pp.reportDate,'%Y-%m') <= '2015-01' AND pa.guarantyOrgID in ('1b6f710ce5054d1d8f9d495f7bc1e142','fbe555a29dd94ed08dacf374dcd85ead','d6f953c683ea41abb946a42fc1004642','73c1bb3d20614bdfa91281622c5b9334') GROUP BY pa.`clientGUID` ) wd15 ON wd15.clientGUID = cc.`clientGUID`
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pa.`clientGUID`, SUM((IFNULL(pp.loadSum, 0) - IFNULL(tab1.payCapitalSum, 0) - IFNULL(tab2.replaceCapitalSum, 0))) AS guarantySum FROM pro_project pp LEFT JOIN pro_apply pa ON pp.`apply_ID` = pa.`apply_ID` LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pfp.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pfp.payCapitalSum, 0)) AS payCapitalSum FROM pro_factpay pfp WHERE 1 = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT(pfp.payDate,'%Y-%m')<='2015-01' GROUP BY pfp.project_ID ) tab1 ON tab1.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pre.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pre.replaceCapitalSum, 0)) AS replaceCapitalSum FROM pro_replace pre WHERE 1 = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT(pre.replaceDate,'%Y-%m')<='2015-01' GROUP BY pre.project_ID ) tab2 ON tab2.project_ID = pp.project_ID WHERE pp.`busiClass` = '02' AND DATE_FORMAT(pp.reportDate,'%Y-%m') <= '2015-01' GROUP BY pa.`clientGUID` ) wdAll15 ON wdAll15.clientGUID = cc.`clientGUID`
LEFT JOIN (SELECT pa.`clientGUID`,SUM((IFNULL(pp.loadSum,0)-IFNULL(tab1.payCapitalSum,0)-IFNULL(tab2.replaceCapitalSum,0))) AS guarantySum FROM pro_project pp LEFT JOIN pro_apply pa ON pp.`apply_ID` = pa.`apply_ID` LEFT JOIN (SELECT pfp.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pfp.payCapitalSum,0)) AS payCapitalSum FROM pro_factpay pfp WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pfp.payDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} GROUP BY pfp.project_ID )tab1 ON tab1.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pre.project_ID,SUM(IFNULL(pre.replaceCapitalSum,0)) AS replaceCapitalSum FROM pro_replace pre WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pre.replaceDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} GROUP BY pre.project_ID )tab2 ON tab2.project_ID = pp.project_ID WHERE pp.`busiClass` = '01' ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pp.`delayBeginDate`,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} ${has(wheresql)?(" and wheresql='"+wheresql+"'"):""} GROUP BY pa.`clientGUID` ) tt1 ON tt1.clientGUID = cc.`clientGUID` LEFT JOIN (SELECT pa.`clientGUID`,SUM((IFNULL(pp.loadSum,0)-IFNULL(tab1.payCapitalSum,0))) AS entrustSum FROM pro_project pp LEFT JOIN pro_apply pa ON pp.`apply_ID` = pa.`apply_ID` LEFT JOIN (SELECT pfp.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pfp.payCapitalSum,0)) AS payCapitalSum FROM pro_factpay pfp WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY pfp.project_ID )tab1 ON tab1.project_ID = pp.project_ID WHERE pp.`busiClass` = '02' ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pp.`delayBeginDate`,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} ${has(wheresql)?(" and wheresql='"+wheresql+"'"):""} GROUP BY pa.`clientGUID` ) tt2 ON tt2.clientGUID = cc.`clientGUID` LEFT JOIN (SELECT pa.`clientGUID`,SUM(pfp.`payCapitalSum`) payCapitalSum,SUM(pfp.`payInterestSum`) payInterestSum FROM pro_factpay pfp LEFT JOIN pro_project pp ON pp.`project_ID` = pfp.`project_ID` LEFT JOIN pro_apply pa ON pfp.`applyID` = pa.`apply_ID` WHERE pp.`busiClass` = '02' ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pfp.payDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pp.`delayBeginDate`,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} ${has(wheresql)?(" and wheresql='"+wheresql+"'"):""} GROUP BY pa.`clientGUID` ) pay ON pay.clientGUID = cc.`clientGUID`
LEFT JOIN (SELECT pa.`clientGUID`,SUM(IFNULL(tab1.replaceSum,0)-IFNULL(tab2.returnSum,0)) AS replaceSum FROM pro_project pp LEFT JOIN pro_apply pa ON pp.`apply_ID` = pa.`apply_ID` LEFT JOIN (SELECT pre.project_ID,SUM(IFNULL(pre.replaceSum,0)) AS replaceSum FROM pro_replace pre WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pre.replaceDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} GROUP BY pre.project_ID)tab1 ON tab1.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT prd.projectID,SUM(IFNULL(prd.returnSum,0)) AS returnSum FROM pro_returnDetail prd WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(prd.returnDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} GROUP BY prd.projectID) tab2 ON tab2.projectID = pp.project_ID WHERE pp.`busiClass` = '01' GROUP BY pa.`clientGUID` )tt3 ON tt3.clientGUID = cc.`clientGUID` WHERE cr.projectTypeID = '44950f5de8614f1588841a9556ba52a2'

Reader.Name: dic_relationMainName
Reader.Sql: SELECT cr.relationMainName FROM crm_relationmain cr WHERE cr.projectTypeID = '44950f5de8614f1588841a9556ba52a2'
Reader.Description: SELECT cr.relationMainName FROM crm_relationmain cr WHERE cr.projectTypeID = '44950f5de8614f1588841a9556ba52a2'
